name: rexpr
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c1), w0), wo(w1, w2))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c1), w0), wo(w1, w2)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c1), w0), wo(w1, w2))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c1), w0), wo(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c1), w0), wo(w1, w2))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c1), w0), wo(w1, w2)))

stmt.origin: rexprg(s0, c0, universe, c1, universe, w0, w1, w2)
stmt.pretty: rexprg(s0, c0, universe, c1, universe, w0, w1, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c1), w0), wo(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w0, w2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c1), w0), wo(w1, w2))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w0, w2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

comment: Convert a restricted existential quantification over a pair to a disjunction. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2015.)
